annotations:
A/C PILLOS , 2.5PCT ADD PUS
1] 50K COAL CIS/KOREA
50/58K DWT SDBC
OVER AGE OK, GLESS OK
DEL VOSTOCHNY
LCAN 07-11 SEP
1TCT VIA CIS PACIFIC WITH COAL
REDEL KOREA
2] 12~20K CEMENT VIETNAM/KOREA
12~21,000 MT BULK CEMENT
(CARGO SIZE TRY TO MAKE VESSEL INTAKE)
OVERAGE OK
SDBC WITH MIN 25T CRANES TO COVER ALL HATCHES
LOA MAX 180 M
LOAD 1SBP NORTH VIETNAM 10 M
DISCH 1SBP KOREA 9 M
LAYCAN 25 / 31 AUG (TRY BIT LATER)
L/D RATE 10K/5K SHINC
FRT INVITE OWRS FIOS BSS 1/1
CHABE REASONABLE DA
++
Best Regards,
Matina Vlachogianni
Rock Marine S.A.
(as brokers only)
Email: drychart@rockmarine.gr
Tel: +30 210 96 89 802
Mob: + 30 6977201632
Skype: live:.cid.92134db6dd02628e
In accordance with the EU GDPR (European Union General Protection Regulation) which has been enforced since May 25th 2018,
we require your explicit agreement and consent to continue maintaining your contact information with ourselves, and to continue
sending to you our circulars (operation, chartering, sale and purchase) and other relevant information pertaining to the day to day
business of Rock Marine S.A.
If however you will no longer be interested to receive our future circulars and want us to delete your contact information with ourselves
please notify us in due course and we will delete all relevant information accordingly. In the meantime, we hereby authorize you to keep
our contact information with yourselves and continue sending us your commercial information related to our business (including but not
limited to sale and purchase offers and inquiries, cargo and period orders, vessels’ positions etc. ) to foll addresses :drychart@rockmarine.gr
